cookie_consent.message: This website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website.

home.intro: Developer tools, financial calculators, and productivity boosters. All the utilities you need in one place.

word_counter.title: Word Counter

word_counter.placeholder: Type or paste your text here...

json_formatter.title: JSON Formatter
json_formatter.description: Format, validate, and minify your JSON data.
json_formatter.seo_content: Free online JSON Formatter and Validator. Beautify and minify your JSON data with a single click. Fix indentation, validate syntax, and make your JSON readable.
json_formatter.how_to_step1: Paste your messy or minified JSON into the input area.
json_formatter.how_to_step2: Click the 'Format' button to beautify the code.
json_formatter.how_to_step3: Use 'Minify' to remove whitespace for production use.
json_formatter.how_to_step4: Click 'Copy' to copy the result to your clipboard.
json_formatter.faq_1_q: Why is my JSON not formatting?
json_formatter.faq_1_a: Check if your JSON is valid. Common errors include missing quotes around keys or trailing commas. Our tool will highlight syntax errors.
json_formatter.faq_2_q: Can I format large JSON files?
json_formatter.faq_2_a: Yes, our tool is optimized for performance and can handle large JSON strings efficiently within your browser.
json_formatter.use_case_1: Beautifying minified API responses for debugging.
json_formatter.use_case_3: Minifying JSON configuration files to save space.

server_time.title: Server Time Check
server_time.description: Check the exact server time of any website.
server_time.subtitle: Essential for ticketing and course registration where every second counts.
server_time.tip1: Works on the same principle as Navyism.
server_time.tip2: Calculates time based on the server's Date header information.
server_time.tip3: Minor deviations may occur due to network latency.
server_time.tip4: Watch the time flow in real-time without refreshing.
server_time.seo_content: Free online server time checker tool. Check the exact server time of Ticketmaster, StubHub, or any website down to 0.1 seconds. Essential tool for successful ticket purchases and course registration.

uuid_generator.title: UUID Generator
uuid_generator.description: Generate and copy secure, unique UUID v4 strings in bulk.
uuid_generator.subtitle: Bulk UUID generation tool for developers
uuid_generator.seo_content: Free online UUID Generator. Generate random UUIDs (v4) instantly. Essential for developers needing unique identifiers for databases and applications.
uuid_generator.how_to_step1: Select the number of UUIDs you want to generate (default is 1).
uuid_generator.how_to_step3: Click the copy icon next to a UUID to copy it.
uuid_generator.how_to_step4: Use 'Copy All' to copy the entire list.
uuid_generator.faq_1_a: Yes, we generate Version 4 UUIDs which are randomly generated. The probability of collision is astronomically low.
uuid_generator.faq_2_a: Yes, you can generate multiple UUIDs at once using the quantity selector.
uuid_generator.use_case_1: Generating unique primary keys for database records.
uuid_generator.use_case_2: Creating unique session IDs or transaction IDs.
uuid_generator.use_case_3: Assigning unique filenames to uploaded assets.

unit_converter.title: Unit Converter

jwt_decoder.title: JWT Decoder
jwt_decoder.description: Decode JWTs instantly in your browser. No server-side processing for your security.
jwt_decoder.privacy_alert: Your token is decoded locally in your browser and never sent to any server.
jwt_decoder.seo_content: Free online JWT Decoder. Decode and inspect JSON Web Tokens (JWT) instantly. View header, payload, and signature details without sending data to a server.
jwt_decoder.how_to_step1: Paste your JWT string into the input area.
jwt_decoder.how_to_step2: The tool will automatically decode the token.
jwt_decoder.how_to_step3: View the Header, Payload, and Signature sections.
jwt_decoder.how_to_step4: Check the expiration time and other claims.
jwt_decoder.faq_1_q: Is it safe to paste my JWT here?
jwt_decoder.faq_1_a: Yes, decoding is done entirely in your browser. Your tokens are never sent to our servers.
jwt_decoder.faq_2_a: Currently, we only support decoding. Signature verification requires your secret key, which you should not share.
jwt_decoder.use_case_1: Debugging authentication issues in web applications.
jwt_decoder.use_case_3: Verifying the structure of a JWT.

unix_timestamp.title: Unix Timestamp Converter
unix_timestamp.description: Convert Unix timestamps to human-readable dates and vice versa.
unix_timestamp.seo_content: Free online Unix Timestamp Converter. Convert Unix timestamps to human-readable dates and vice versa. Supports seconds, milliseconds, and microseconds.
unix_timestamp.how_to_step1: Enter a Unix timestamp to convert it to a date.
unix_timestamp.how_to_step2: Or, select a date and time to convert it to a Unix timestamp.
unix_timestamp.how_to_step3: The tool automatically detects seconds, milliseconds, or microseconds.
unix_timestamp.how_to_step4: Click the copy button to save the result.
unix_timestamp.faq_1_a: It is the number of seconds that have elapsed since January 1, 1970 (UTC). It is widely used in computer systems to track time.
unix_timestamp.faq_2_a: Yes, our tool automatically detects 13-digit timestamps as milliseconds and 10-digit timestamps as seconds.
unix_timestamp.use_case_1: Debugging server logs with timestamped entries.

cron_generator.title: Cron Expression Generator
cron_generator.description: Generate complex Cron schedules easily with a few clicks.
cron_generator.seo_content: Free online Cron Expression Generator. Create Linux Crontab schedules easily with a GUI and get human-readable descriptions. Set up recurring tasks for minutes, hours, days, weeks, and months.
cron_generator.how_to_step1: Select the frequency tab (Minutes, Hourly, Daily, Weekly, Monthly).
cron_generator.how_to_step2: Configure the specific time and day settings.
cron_generator.how_to_step3: The Cron expression is automatically generated below.
cron_generator.how_to_step4: Click 'Copy' to use it in your crontab file.
cron_generator.faq_1_a: Cron is a time-based job scheduler in Unix-like computer operating systems. Users use cron to schedule jobs (commands or scripts) to run periodically at fixed times, dates, or intervals.
cron_generator.faq_2_a: This tool generates standard 5-field cron expressions (minute, hour, day of month, month, day of week) used in most Linux systems.

password_generator.faq_2_q: What is a good password length?
password_generator.faq_2_a: We recommend a minimum of 12 characters, mixing letters, numbers, and symbols for better security.
password_generator.use_case_1: Creating strong passwords for new online accounts.
password_generator.use_case_3: Generating secure keys for Wi-Fi or encryption.

bmi_calculator.title: BMI Calculator
bmi_calculator.description: Calculate your Body Mass Index (BMI) based on height and weight.
bmi_calculator.tip_underweight: You are underweight. It's important to eat a balanced diet and consult a healthcare provider to reach a healthy weight.
bmi_calculator.tip_normal: Great job! You have a healthy weight. Maintain your balanced diet and regular exercise to stay healthy.
bmi_calculator.tip_overweight: You are slightly overweight. Consider a balanced diet and regular physical activity to manage your weight.
bmi_calculator.tip_obese: You are in the obese range. It is recommended to consult a healthcare provider for a personalized weight management plan.
bmi_calculator.tip_severe_obese: You are in the severely obese range. Please consult a healthcare provider for immediate medical advice and support.
bmi_calculator.seo_content: Free online BMI Calculator. Enter your height and weight to calculate your Body Mass Index (BMI) and check your weight status. Essential tool for health management.
bmi_calculator.how_to_step4: Check your BMI score and weight status classification.
bmi_calculator.faq_1_a: BMI stands for Body Mass Index. It is a simple calculation using a person's height and weight. The formula is BMI = kg/m2 where kg is a person's weight in kilograms and m2 is their height in metres squared.
bmi_calculator.faq_2_a: BMI does not distinguish between muscle and fat. Therefore, athletes with high muscle mass may be classified as overweight even if they have low body fat.

vat_calculator.title: VAT Calculator
vat_calculator.description: Calculate VAT (Value Added Tax) and total amount easily. Supports both tax-exclusive and tax-inclusive calculations.
vat_calculator.seo_content: Free online VAT Calculator. Calculate Value Added Tax (VAT) quickly and accurately. Supports adding tax to net amount or extracting tax from gross amount. Customizable tax rates for all countries.

aspect_ratio_calculator.title: Aspect Ratio Calculator
aspect_ratio_calculator.description: Calculate dimensions based on aspect ratio. Useful for designers, developers, and video editors.
aspect_ratio_calculator.seo_content: Free online Aspect Ratio Calculator. Calculate width or height based on 16:9, 4:3, 21:9 and other common aspect ratios. Essential tool for responsive design and video editing.
aspect_ratio_calculator.how_to_step1: Enter the known width or height.
aspect_ratio_calculator.how_to_step2: Select a common aspect ratio (e.g., 16:9) or enter a custom one.
aspect_ratio_calculator.how_to_step3: The tool automatically calculates the missing dimension.
aspect_ratio_calculator.how_to_step4: Use the result for your design or video project.
aspect_ratio_calculator.faq_1_a: Aspect Ratio is the proportional relationship between the width and height of an image or screen.
aspect_ratio_calculator.faq_2_q: What is the standard aspect ratio for YouTube?
aspect_ratio_calculator.faq_2_a: The standard aspect ratio for YouTube videos is 16:9. Vertical Shorts use 9:16.
aspect_ratio_calculator.use_case_1: Resizing images for social media posts.

bmr_calculator.title: BMR Calculator
bmr_calculator.description: Start your diet journey! Calculate your Basal Metabolic Rate (BMR) and Total Daily Energy Expenditure (TDEE).
bmr_calculator.result_tdee_desc: Calories needed per day to maintain current weight.
bmr_calculator.seo_content: Knowing your BMR is crucial for successful weight loss. We use the Mifflin-St Jeor equation to provide the most accurate BMR and TDEE calculations.
bmr_calculator.how_to_step1: Enter your gender, age, height, and weight.
bmr_calculator.how_to_step4: Check your Basal Metabolic Rate (BMR) and Total Daily Energy Expenditure (TDEE).
bmr_calculator.faq_1_q: What is the difference between BMR and TDEE?
bmr_calculator.faq_1_a: BMR (Basal Metabolic Rate) is the calories you burn at rest. TDEE (Total Daily Energy Expenditure) is the total calories you burn including activity.
bmr_calculator.faq_2_q: Should I eat less than my BMR?
bmr_calculator.faq_2_a: No, eating less than your BMR can slow down your metabolism and cause health issues. Aim to eat between your BMR and TDEE for weight loss.
bmr_calculator.use_case_1: Setting a minimum calorie intake baseline.
bmr_calculator.use_case_2: Planning a safe weight loss strategy.

tdee_calculator.title: TDEE & Macro Calculator
tdee_calculator.description: Calculate your Total Daily Energy Expenditure and macronutrient needs.
tdee_calculator.seo_content: Calculate your Total Daily Energy Expenditure (TDEE) and macronutrient split for weight loss, maintenance, or muscle gain. Based on the Mifflin-St Jeor equation.
tdee_calculator.how_to_step1: Enter your gender, age, height, and weight.
tdee_calculator.how_to_step2: Select your daily activity level accurately.
tdee_calculator.how_to_step3: Choose your goal (Lose, Maintain, or Gain weight).
tdee_calculator.how_to_step4: Click 'Calculate' to see your daily calories and macros.
tdee_calculator.faq_1_a: TDEE stands for Total Daily Energy Expenditure. It is the total number of calories you burn in a day, including exercise.
tdee_calculator.faq_2_a: We use the Mifflin-St Jeor equation, which is considered one of the most accurate formulas. However, individual metabolism varies.
tdee_calculator.use_case_2: Calculating surplus calories for muscle gain (bulking).
tdee_calculator.use_case_3: Finding maintenance calories to stay at current weight.

subnet_calculator.title: CIDR / Subnet Calculator
subnet_calculator.description: Calculate network range, broadcast address, and usable IPs from CIDR.
subnet_calculator.seo_content: Free online IPv4 Subnet Calculator. Calculate network ranges, subnet masks, CIDR notation, and usable IP addresses. Essential for network engineers and IT professionals.

subnet_calculator.how_to_step3: The tool automatically calculates network details.
subnet_calculator.how_to_step4: View the Network Address, Broadcast Address, and Host Range.
subnet_calculator.faq_1_a: Classless Inter-Domain Routing (CIDR) is a method for allocating IP addresses and IP routing. It replaces the older classful network design.
subnet_calculator.faq_2_q: How many hosts are in a /24 subnet?
subnet_calculator.faq_2_a: A /24 subnet has 256 total IP addresses, but 254 are usable for hosts (one for network address, one for broadcast).
subnet_calculator.use_case_1: Planning network architecture and IP allocation.

regex_tester.faq_1_a: Regular Expressions (Regex) are sequences of characters that define a search pattern. They are used for string searching and manipulation.
regex_tester.faq_2_a: The 'g' (global) flag indicates that the regex should be tested against all possible matches in a string, not just the first one.

json_diff.description: Compare two JSON objects and visualize the differences.
json_diff.seo_content: Free online JSON Diff tool. Compare two JSON objects side-by-side and highlight differences. Essential for debugging API responses and configuration files.

json_diff.how_to_step3: Click the 'Compare' button to see the differences.
json_diff.how_to_step4: Additions are highlighted in green, and deletions in red.
json_diff.faq_1_a: Yes, our tool supports JSON5 (Relaxed JSON), so unquoted keys and trailing commas are accepted.
json_diff.faq_2_a: Absolutely. All comparisons are performed locally in your browser. No data is sent to our servers.
json_diff.use_case_1: Debugging API responses by comparing expected vs. actual output.
json_diff.use_case_2: Tracking changes in configuration files (e.g., package.json, tsconfig.json).

color_palette.title: Color Palette Generator
color_palette.description: Extract dominant colors from an image and generate a palette.
color_palette.upload_label: Drag & Drop or Click to Upload Image
color_palette.seo_content: Extract beautiful color palettes from any image. Our tool analyzes your photos to find the dominant colors and provides Hex, RGB, and HSL codes. Perfect for designers, artists, and developers.
color_palette.how_to_step1: Upload an image by dragging and dropping or clicking the upload area.
color_palette.how_to_step2: Wait for the tool to analyze the image automatically.
color_palette.how_to_step3: View the extracted color palette with Hex and RGB codes.
color_palette.how_to_step4: Click on any color code to copy it to your clipboard.
color_palette.faq_1_a: We support all common web image formats including JPG, PNG, WEBP, and GIF.
color_palette.faq_2_q: Is my image uploaded to a server?
color_palette.faq_2_a: No, your privacy is important. Image processing happens entirely in your browser. Your images are never uploaded to our servers.
color_palette.use_case_1: Web Designers looking for a color scheme that matches a hero image.
color_palette.use_case_2: Digital Artists creating cohesive artwork based on reference photos.
color_palette.use_case_3: Developers needing exact color codes from design mockups.

url_encoder.title: URL Encoder / Decoder
url_encoder.description: Encode or decode URLs simply and securely. Convert special characters to their percent-encoded versions.
url_encoder.placeholder: Enter text to encode or decode...
url_encoder.seo_content: Free online URL Encoder/Decoder tool. Easily convert text to URL-safe format (percent-encoding) or decode encoded URLs back to readable text. Essential for web developers and SEO.
url_encoder.how_to_step1: Enter or paste your text/URL into the input box.
url_encoder.how_to_step2: Click 'Encode' to convert special characters to % codes.
url_encoder.how_to_step3: Click 'Decode' to convert % codes back to normal text.
url_encoder.how_to_step4: Use the 'Copy' button to save the result to your clipboard.
url_encoder.faq_1_a: URL encoding converts characters into a format that can be transmitted over the Internet. It replaces unsafe ASCII characters with a '%' followed by two hexadecimal digits.
url_encoder.faq_2_q: Why do I need to encode URLs?
url_encoder.faq_2_a: URLs can only contain a limited set of characters. Spaces and other special symbols must be encoded to ensure the URL is valid and works correctly across all browsers and servers.
url_encoder.use_case_1: Preparing query string parameters for API calls.
url_encoder.use_case_2: Fixing broken links containing special characters.
url_encoder.use_case_3: Decoding complex URLs to read their parameters.

meta_tag_generator.title: Meta Tag Generator
meta_tag_generator.description: Generate SEO-friendly Meta Tags and Open Graph tags for social media sharing. Preview how your website looks on Google and Facebook.
meta_tag_generator.seo_content: Boost your SEO and social media presence with our free Meta Tag Generator. Create perfect title tags, meta descriptions, and Open Graph (OG) tags to ensure your content looks great on Google, Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn.
meta_tag_generator.how_to_step1: Enter your website's Title and Description. Keep them concise and keyword-rich.
meta_tag_generator.how_to_step2: Add your Site URL and a link to your representative image (OG Image).
meta_tag_generator.how_to_step3: Check the 'Google Preview' and 'Social Preview' to see how it looks.
meta_tag_generator.how_to_step4: Click 'Copy Code' and paste the HTML into the <head> section of your website.
meta_tag_generator.faq_1_a: Meta tags are snippets of text that describe a page's content. They don't appear on the page itself but only in the page's source code. They tell search engines what a web page is about.
meta_tag_generator.faq_2_a: Open Graph tags control how your content is displayed when shared on social media platforms like Facebook, LinkedIn, and Pinterest. They allow you to set a custom title, description, and image.
meta_tag_generator.use_case_1: Bloggers wanting to optimize their posts for search engines.
meta_tag_generator.use_case_2: Developers needing to quickly generate standard SEO tags.
meta_tag_generator.use_case_3: Marketers ensuring their landing pages look attractive on social media.

privacy.intro_content: Welcome to Cheetset. We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy will inform you as to how we look after your personal data when you visit our website and tell you about your privacy rights and how the law protects you.
privacy.data_collection_content: We do not collect any personal data that can identify you directly. However, we may collect non-personal data such as browser type, operating system, and IP address for analytics purposes to improve our service.
privacy.cookies_content: We use cookies to enhance your experience. You can set your browser to refuse all or some browser cookies, or to alert you when websites set or access cookies.
privacy.adsense_content_1: We use Google AdSense to display ads. Google uses cookies to serve ads based on your prior visits to our website or other websites. Google's use of advertising cookies enables it and its partners to serve ads to you based on your visit to our sites and/or other sites on the Internet.
privacy.adsense_content_2: You may opt out of personalized advertising by visiting Google Ads Settings.
privacy.security_content: We have put in place appropriate security measures to prevent your personal data from being accidentally lost, used, or accessed in an unauthorized way. For tools like our "Word Counter", all processing happens in your browser. Your text data is never sent to our servers.
privacy.contact_content: If you have any questions about this privacy policy, please contact us at: support@cheetset.com

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro_content: Welcome to Cheetset. These terms and conditions outline the rules and regulations for the use of our website. By accessing this website we assume you accept these terms and conditions.
terms.usage_content: You must use our services for lawful purposes only. Our tools are provided 'as is' without any warranties.
terms.disclaimer_content: Cheetset does not guarantee the accuracy, reliability, or completeness of the service. In particular, results from financial tools (Salary Calculator, Compound Interest Calculator, etc.) should be used for reference only.
terms.contact_content: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at support@cheetset.com
